CustomField.formula: "&id=" + Id + "&Queryid=[Orgmeasures]a0iN0000004ff3E?pv0=" + Organisation__r.Id + "&Queryid=[Orgrequirements]a0iN0000004ff39?pv0=" + Organisation__r.Id + "[Initirequirements]a0iN0000004ff2z" + "[Initipayments]a0iN0000004ff34" + "&OFN=" + SUBSTITUTE (Name,"&","{~~~}") + "+-+Report" + "&TemplateId=" + SUBSTITUTE (Report_Type__c ,"&","{~~~}") + SUBSTITUTE (T_C_PDF__c,"&","{~~~}") + "&FP0=0" + "&EmailToId=00590000002P6ND" + "&EmailRelatedToId=" + Id + "&EmailTemplateId=a0kN0000002syGi" + "&EmailSubject=Investment+Schedule+Report" + SUBSTITUTE (Name,"&","{~~~}") + "&DefaultPDF=1" + "&OFN=Terms+and+Conditions" + "&UFO=1" + "&DS7=12" + "&QMode=3"
CustomField.label: Conga Workflow URL
